GSD.description:
ARM: versatile: Add missing of_node_put in dcscb_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 3c6006faed9aba5144b33176d061031a9be66954. For more details please see the references link.
